```{r}

# task 1

pm2_5 <- 120

if (pm2_5 < 100) {
  print("Low to moderate risk")
} else if (pm2_5 >= 100 & pm2_5 < 150) {
  print("Unhealthy for sensitive groups")
} else (pm2_5 >= 150) 
  print("Health risk present")


```

```{r}

# task 3

base_burrito <- 6.50

main_ingredient <- "chicken"

if (main_ingredient == "veggie") {
  print(base_burrito)
} else if (main_ingredient == "chicken") {
  print(base_burrito + 3)
} else (main_ingredient == "steak")
  print(base_burrito + 3.25)


```


```{r}

# task 4

fish <- c(8, 10, 12, 23)

fish_prop <- vector(mode = "numeric", length = length(fish))

for (i in 1:length(fish)) {
  fish_prop[i] <- fish[i] / sum(fish) 
}

print(fish_prop)

```
